Description:
High-Explosive shells for use in heavy ballistic weapons, effective against medium and heavy warships.

Low-velocity shells with a large explosive payload for destroying the interiors of warships, but lacks the armor penetration of AP shells. Best used against slow, heavy targets in broadside volleys, following a salvo of AP shells.

Type: Ballistic/Chemical
Size: 450mm
Role: Offensive
Armor Penetration: 65 cm
Component Damage: 150 hp
Penetration Depth: 30 m
Muzzle Velocity: 750 m/s
Range: 11,250 m
Volume: 0.8 mÂ³
Explosion Radius: 15
